Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.

By using tear gas against citizens to make way for his photo op at St. John's, this disgraced and impeached president violated the rights to peaceably assemble, speak ; petition for redress of grievances—and worship without Trump turning your temple into a liar's den.
